author: Robert Flindell
comment: Great and simile interface to keep track of income, spending and budgets. I've used this on a daily basis and find it very easy to use. Only issue being I get paid mid month and the app appears restart your spending based on a calendar month. There may be a way to adjust this but I've not located yet. Still a great app.
title: Fantastic app

author: Yap Hock Heng
comment: Love the fact that it works with my android wear but the widget on the phone does not update immediately after I keyed in a new expense. Please fix. Thanks.
title: Widget does not update

author: salman farisy
comment: (-) Monthly subscription.
title: (+) Partners module allowing to share the same budget between users.

author: Daniel Griffiths
comment: Good app, potentially could go mainstream but you need to stop it from asking me to donate. You should use well placed adverts if you need to raise money it's more effective and won't get in the way as much.

reply.author: TechBrewery.net
reply.content: Ads were not efficient as the user base was too small. Paid service is not proving to be better. I'm happy that you like the app though. I wish I could afford some promotion, which could be the key probably. But I'm no company, just a single developer with a full time job doing this stuff on the free time.

title: Great potential but has an issue

author: James Harrison
comment: Just updated app and it won't let me use it unless i link it to my google account and allow it to tell people when I'm logged into it.... thats no one else's buisness regardless if they are friends and family or not... uninstalling and never coming back

reply.author: TechBrewery.net
reply.content: It's not telling anything to anyone. It's just a way of authorizing you as the owner of your delicate financial data. It's way more secure than classic sign in. It's also way faster.

title: Liked it at one time

author: Michael Jennings
comment: Love it.  Issues: Schedule operation screen clears description field if you click some of the other fields like the date or category. "POWTARZANIE" (??) needs to be translated to English. Need a way to delete categories, if possible.

reply.author: TechBrewery.net
reply.content: Thanks for the feedback. I'll correct the issues, deleting categories will be tricky though.

author: Rayner Lily Martyr
comment: Used to be an awesome app ever since it got updated its wiped out all my stored data and doesn't give me an option to restore from backup....

reply.author: TechBrewery.net
reply.content: Please contact me at aprilappsstudio@gmail.com. I'm really wan't to fix that for everybody, but need a help of 1 regular version user. Got none since now (I don't think the data is wiped, we should be able to restore it)

title: Samsung S4

author: hussain alhelli
comment: Need multiple accounts please ,,
title: Nice ..

author: Stuart Uster
comment: Forced to upgrade. No warning given. Lost all my data for the month. Will be using something else from no on. Couldn't be less happy.

reply.author: TechBrewery.net
reply.content:
Sorry for that! Please contact me at aprilappsstudio@gmail.com. I'm sure we can still restore that data.

BTW. It's just an android behavior, it automatically updates your apps without warnings, this app is no exception from that

title: Garbage

author: Daniel Wabuge
comment: What if ai have cash in my bank, and I want to move it to my card, is it possible? I cant see this option.
title: Money Transfer?

author: Malaka Saumya
comment: This app help me daily.
title: Excellent

author: Justin Duckworth
comment: Super easy to categorize and manage money easy visual display nothing to complicated just the basics

author: The Food Industry
comment: Good app so far :)

author: SUJAY HALDER
comment: Good
title: Halder

author: jo chu
title: Very easy to use and keeps track of your expenses

author: Graham Hirst
comment: Really needs the ability to have separate accounts ie bank and credit or savings etc and to allow transfer between them. Other wise very good
title: Missing some needed features...

author: Чижик Пыжик
comment: Will be there something for budget?

author: Cliff John Fernandez
comment: Needs "DAILY/WEEKLY" analysis... Not just monthly anaysis...
title: DAILY & WEEKLY ANALYSIS...

author: Martin Major
comment: Near perfection but feels like for left handed people.
title: Very good

comment: Awesome app. Just what I needed. U don't need to put any account numbers in.  Amazing
title: Love it

author: Ikram Hussain
comment: Simple, easy and fast
title: Kool app:)

author: Rayners Estévez
comment: It gets the job done, simple interface. Shows you everything. I'm buying the Pro version at the end of this month.
title: Simple and Useful

author: Michelle Bergin
comment: Woot!
title: Awesome

author: Dragan Marinkovic
comment: Simple and awesome.
title: Nice

author: Nur Wardah Norman
comment: I love it so much since it is easy to use. Thanks for the apps!!!
title: EASY!!

author: Andrei Adascalitei
comment: Very intuitive and simple to use. Thank you
title: Simple and user friendly

author: Mainne Caoile
comment: Very useful. :)
title: Nice app.

author: Muhammad Taufiq
comment: I luv this app...
title: Work it

author: Rachel Spatz
comment: I don't need a bunch of complicated stuff so the simplicity to navigate this app is nice. Only gripes, won't change the day. If it's the 16 but you want to record the 15th, it'll show up as 16th. Also, have to attempt to go to the app twice because the first time it says there was an error and won't open.
title: Pretty good

author: R Robinson
comment: Does what it says on the tin... Not fancy, but a solid basic financial/expense tracker..
title: Works fine..

author: Dan Hepplewhite
comment: Could do with daily/weekly analysis not just monthly. Other than that, spot on!
title: Amost perfect.

author: Edward Moreno
comment: Been trying to get used to it seems okay at so far could use a few different ideas though, a few more features or diffrent look?

reply.author: TechBrewery.net
reply.content: Hope you'll like new look! :) Regards, Jack

title: Not bad

author: Kelly Marsh
comment: Was all going well until after only entering one standing order I have to pay to add more. Uninstalling!!

reply.author: TechBrewery.net
reply.content: It took a lot of hard work to develop the app. It was 1$ back then. I dont think it was unfair to want something back for all the hard work, which can't be said about this opinion. Try new v2 version and please reconsider. Regards. Jack

title: Have to pay to use

author: bryan dela cruz
comment: Im a finance guy and finding this kind of apps makes my expense monitoring easier... nice one dev.
title: Best money monitoring ever

author: marcus brooks
comment: This app is great for me cuz i can buget myself and also save money very well. I can see where my money is going.
title: Great app

author: Bakya raj
comment: Very usefull apps .but it doesn't have purpose spending , otherwise nice
title: Galaxy tab2

author: Chloe Scott
comment: This app is so simple and easy to use. It's just what I was hoping to find to manage my money.
title: Amazing!

author: alex V
comment: Love it, easy to use. Helps me keep track if my spending very well.
title: Super cool

author: Olivia Barabas
comment: I love how I can manage money with this simple app. I even use it for my business. It's easy to use and comprehensive.
title: Great app

author: Travis Usinger
comment: I use this to track my tips and any cash income and expenses. Simple, Easy, Effective.
title: Tracking Cash
